faqTexts.title: Online safety
content: Online safety is crucial in today's digital world as it protects personal information and privacy from potential threats. By practicing safe browsing habits, using strong, unique passwords, and enabling two-factor authentication, individuals can significantly reduce the risk of cyberattacks. It's also essential to be cautious when sharing personal details on social media and to be aware of phishing scams that attempt to steal sensitive information. Regularly updating software and using reliable security tools further enhances online safety, ensuring a secure and enjoyable internet experience.

faqTexts.title: Delivery & returns
content:
We offer fast and reliable shipping options to ensure your order arrives on time.  
Orders are typically processed within 1-3 business days.  
Once your order has shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email to monitor its progress.  
Please note that delivery times may vary based on your location and the shipping method selected at checkout.  

If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we accept returns within 30 days of delivery.  
Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and accompanied by a receipt.  
To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team for a return authorization number.  
Shipping costs for returns are the responsibility of the customer, unless the item is defective or incorrect.  
Refunds will be processed to the original payment method once the returned item is received and inspected.  

For any questions or further assistance, please feel free to reach out to our customer service team.  
We appreciate your business and are here to help!
